member.name: M:System.Uid64.Generate
member.summary: Generates an id based on the current UTC time and a random part.
member.returns: An integer 64 id containing the encoded current UTC time.

member.name: M:System.Uid64.EncodeDateTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Encodes a DateTime value to an integer 64 value.

member.name: M:System.Uid64.DecodeDateTime(System.Int64)
member.summary: Decodes a DateTime value from an encoded integer 64 value.
